name: Rattrap Jam 2022 - Black Hole Rising
description:
20th moon of 65325th turn of Raptoria - #Entry 7 -

Something strange happened. Some of our explorers haven't come back yet.
We saw some sort of black hole from the main observatory base.
I'm afraid it might grow and come to the base.
We need help.
###
20th moon of 65325th turn of Raptoria - #Entry 8 -

The black hole approaches and grew too big for us to escape.
If the signal reaches the main base, do not come on this planet.
###

Main Base -Entry 1-

Welcome new player!
You will be sent to this planet where we lost signal!
Your objective will be to gather information of that joke of a "black hole" that our team on the spot sent before we lost signal. Still, be careful. Some say that your left arm is strong with the help of your grapple, and your right one is for his little rocket launcher.
Please remain safe.
Good luck!

Controls: ZQSD for basic movement
                      Spacebar to jump
                      Left-click uses your grapple
                      Right-click uses your rocket launcher.
In this game, you have to flee from a black hole on the planet you are sent to and get back to your ship alive.

The team :
Game Design: Clément Navarro, Simon Dialinas
Game Art: Mathis Calmettes-Sombris
Game Prog: Théo Driutti, Lucas Guichard, Léo Nimsgern

Music: Kai Engel - Meekness
                - YouFulca
